bg-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-gray-900 sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; interface Vehicle { _id: string; brand: string; model: string; variant: string; category: string; fuel_type: string; pricing?: { ex_showroom_inr: number; on_road_inr: number; }; images?: { thumbnail: string; }; ratings?: { user_rating: number; reviews_count?: number; }; } const EnhancedHomePage: React.FC = () => { const [featuredVehicles, setFeaturedVehicles] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchFeaturedVehicles(); }, []); const fetchFeaturedVehicles = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/vehicles?featured=true&limit=6'); setFeaturedVehicles(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching featured vehicles:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const formatPrice = (price: number) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'INR', maximumFractionDigits: 0, }).format(price); }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
Premium Automotive Marketplace

Find Your Perfect Ride

Discover premium two-wheelers, sell your vehicle, and experience the ultimate automotive marketplace. From classic cruisers to cutting-edge electric vehicles.

Browse Vehicles Sell Your Vehicle
{/* Floating Elements */}
{/* About Us Section */}

About Vahan Bazar

We are India's premier destination for automotive excellence, combining decades of expertise with cutting-edge technology to deliver an unparalleled vehicle buying and selling experience.

Premium Selection

Curated collection of the finest vehicles from leading manufacturers, ensuring only the highest quality reaches our customers.

Quality Assurance

Every vehicle undergoes rigorous inspection and certification, guaranteeing performance, safety, and reliability.

Customer-Centric

Our dedicated team provides personalized service, expert guidance, and ongoing support throughout your automotive journey.

Why Choose Vahan Bazar

Experience the difference with our commitment to excellence, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

{/* Feature 1 */}

Quality Guarantee

Every vehicle comes with our comprehensive quality guarantee, ensuring you get the best value for your investment.

Learn More
{/* Feature 2 */}

24/7 Support

Round-the-clock customer support and roadside assistance to ensure your peace of mind on every journey.

Learn More
{/* Feature 3 */}

Flexible Financing

Competitive financing options and flexible payment plans to make your dream vehicle accessible.

Learn More
{/* Our Specialty Section */}

Our Specialty

What sets us apart in the automotive marketplace.

Verified Sellers

All sellers are verified and trusted members of our community.

Fast Transactions

Quick and secure transactions with instant verification.

Personal Service

Dedicated support team for personalized assistance.

Secure Platform

Bank-grade security for all transactions and data.

{/* Featured Vehicles Section */}

Featured Vehicles

Discover our handpicked selection of premium vehicles.
